alert.note: Alert for Claiborne (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 13 at 8:56AM CDT by NWS Shreveport
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of western Union, southeastern Columbia Counties in southwestern Arkansas and northeastern Claiborne Parishes through 945 AM CDT... At 856 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Atlanta, or 12 miles southeast of Magnolia, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... El Dorado, Junction City, Emerson, Village, Lisbon, Atlanta, Wesson, Calhoun, Hew Hope, Newell, Marysville, Cairo, Noxobe, Three Creeks and Spotville. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 1000 AM CDT for southwestern Arkansas...and northwestern Louisiana.
